title: Handy joystick and more, v2.11.0
content:
FEATURES:
  - Multi-tab

ENHANCEMENTS:
  - Added step direction for gradient generator
  - Custom objects can be long-press + drag to add to canvas
  - Reduce lag when showing pixel grid on big canvases
  - Reference layer from GIF can change frame with the canvas
  - Grayscale image compatibility
  - Preview's tap-to-navigate can be turned off
  - Theme will automatically update to its latest version
  - Colors in palette can be edited directly
